file_insights.changes: Added comprehensive documentation on multi-site template structure
file_insights.section_added: Appendix C: Multi-Site Template Structure for Reusability

patterns_discovered: Modular brand theming system with shared infrastructure
Token-based design system for consistent multi-site management
Monorepo architecture with shared packages and site-specific configurations
Flexible theme configuration using TypeScript interfaces
gotchas_discovered: Managing unique content across multiple sites
Balancing shared code with brand-specific requirements
Maintaining consistent infrastructure while allowing brand differentiation

goals_achieved: Documented template structure for Adam Tech ecosystem sites

recommendations: Use TypeScript for type-safe theme configurations
Implement monorepo with shared packages for maximum code reuse
Create clear separation between shared and brand-specific code
Use environment variables for dynamic brand selection
Develop comprehensive theme token system to manage brand variations
